name: Organic Jacho Lip Balm
description:
· Unscented /  Floral
· Healing & Nourishing
· organic, all natural, made with Asian herb 紫草 Jacho

The balm itself has a light pink color, which comes from Jacho 紫草 herb. I infused this healing herb in organic extra virgin olive oil to get its benefit. It is well-known for removing toxins. It contains Allantoin which accelerates the replacement of cells; used throughout centuries to heal sores, irritations, wounds and eczema. 
This lip balm can be also used on your face. Apply it gently on your dry spot. I also added high quality fresh oils to keep skin moisturized. 

· 0.15oz, 5ml
· unscented / floral
<font style="text-decoration:underline;">Floral</font> scented with therapeutic grade organic essential oils, Palmarosa and Rose geranium
·  Ingredients : Asian healing herb 紫草 *infused organic extra virgin olive oil, organic shea butter, organic evening primrose oil, organic avocado oil, organic apricot kernel oil, Refined bees wax, organic essential oils, Vitamin E (natural, GMO free) and Love for life. *grown organically, wildcrafted, therapeutic grade

There may be a small amount of root powder in the balm. 
And the color of actual lip balm will vary from the photo. 

* Custom Order 
If you want to purchase multiple items, please don't hesitate to contact me with the details. I will do my best to set up a custom listing with appropriate shipping charges for you.

name: Organic Cacao Lip Butter
description:
· Unscented / Vanilla
· Nourishing & Moisturizing
· Soft texture, slow absorbing, and long lasting
· Handmade with unrefined organic oils and local bees wax

I carefully formulated this lip butter with organic oils, butters and local bees wax which are slowly absorbed by skin to help make it long lasting. As all ingredients are unrefined, it made the lip butter extra nourishing and beneficial.

Coconut oil is rich in saturated fats with skin-strengthening vitamin E. Cacao butter is a soothing emollient that has been used for centuries in Africa for skin care. Shea butter's high content of unique fatty acid moisturizes and retains the elasticity of the skin. Bees wax is known to lock in moisture and protect skin from damaging environmental factors. Its anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties make it beneficial for wound healing, too.

· 0.15oz, 5ml
· unscented / Vanilla, scented with vanilla absolute oil^.
· Ingredients : unrefined organic cacao butter, organic virgin coconut oil, local bees wax, unrefined and fair trade organic shea butter, unrefined organic avocado oil, organic extra virgin olive oil, organic vanilla extract, non GMO vitamin E, and love for life. 
^Kosher certified, therapeutic grade.

Custom Order 
If you want to purchase multiple items, please send me a message with the details. I will do my best to set up a custom listing with appropriate shipping charges for you. 
And please check updated shop policies before your order. 

Thank you so much for visiting my shop. 
Have a lovely day.

name: Organic Lip Tint - Sunset Red
description:
· Healthy red tone lip tint
· Unscented / Rose Geranium (sold out) / Vanilla (sold out)
· Handmade with organic oils and 3 healing herbs
· Mica, Clay free 

Asian healing herb Jacho 紫草, Gamcho 甘草 and alkanet root.
The combination of those three herbs created comfortable red color for your lips. It is made without any mica or clay powder which can irritate your skin and clog your pores. With a little touch, it is good to try on your cheeks.

• 0.15oz, 5ml
• Unscented / Rose Geranium / Vanilla
• Ingredients : Asian healing herb 紫草* infused organic extra virgin olive oil, organic Asian licorice & organic alkanet root infused organic sunflower seed oil, organic avocado oil, organic shea butter, bees wax, non-gmo vitamin E and Love for life. 
+ organic rose geranium essential oil, vanilla absolute essential oil for each scent.
* The color of actual lip tint will slightly vary from the photos. 

Thank you so much for visiting my shop. 
Have a lovely day.

name: Organic Deodorant 0.65oz
description: · Organic deodorant with a natural herbal scent · Aromatherapeutic essential oil blending · Mini size * discounted price until the end of 2013. Scent : 1. Herbal Light - subtle, sweet, lavender dominant with Myrrh, Lavender, Tea tree + 2. Herbal Blue - balsamic and herbal, unisex with Frankincense, Rosemary, Atlas Cedarwood, and a few more 3. Asian Citrus - refreshing, unique blend of citrus and wood with Bergamot, Elemi, Lavender + 4. Soft Patchouli - light touch of flower, gentle with Patchouli, Ylang ylang extra, Elemi + 5. Dark Patchouli - balsamic, woody, deep with Amyris, Frankincense, Patchouli + + a few more essential oils * More scents are coming. This deodorant is made with a unique combination of organic essential oils, organic neem oil, korean barley clay(=elvan clay), organic arrowroot powder, and organic licorice extracts. It provides deodorizing, anti-bacterial, and soothing properties. The organic oils and shea butter are easily absorbed by skin and nourish our sensitive underarms. This natural deodorant contains a bit more essential oils than other skin care products. So, when you use it, I recommend to try a small amount first, maybe one swipe, and see how it goes. • White twist-up tube 0.65oz / 19g • Ingredients: organic sunflower seed oil, organic apricot kernel oil, organic macadamia nut oil, organic shea butter, bees wax, organic neem oil, organic arrow root powder, Korean barley clay, sodium bicarbonate(baking soda), organic licorice extract, non-gmo vitamin E, rosemary oleoresin extract, organic/wildcrafted essential oils, and love for life. • Certified organic / Kosher certified / wildcrafted essential oils • Please use within 12 months of the day of purchase. This natural deodorant has a light perfume quality. As I added a bit more essential oils than usual, when you use the deodorant, I recommend to try a small amount first, maybe one swipe, and see how it goes. The formula of this deodorant came out after years of experiments and countless tests. But still as we all have very different skin conditions, some might not be fully satisfied with it. If you have any problem with this deodorant, please let me know. It is more important for me to bring a little joy and happiness to you than selling one product. Thank you so much for visiting my shop.

name: Organic Gamcho Cleansing Oil 15ml
description:
· A small cleansing oil bottle for the curious of heart
· Washable, mild daily oil cleaser and massage oil
· <u>Scents</u>: Unscented / Lavender / Tea tree / Bergamot
* made to order (3~5 days to prepare)
* 10% off discount until the end of 2013

Asian licorice 감초(甘草 Gamcho) has been used in traditional Asian medicine for thousands of years. It has both anti-inflammatory and emollient qualities and contains abundant vitamin A, B, C. This herb soothes irritated, inflamed skin and keeps our skin tone bright and healthy. Beside this beautiful herb, I used fresh unrefined organic oils to bring nourishing properties to the cleansing oil.

Although it may not remove 100% of make-up, it will be helpful for someone who is looking for a mild daily cleansing oil. After a long hard day, when you feel dusty and dirty, this cleansing oil will be a little treat for your skin.

How to use: Please apply this cleansing oil on your dry skin and gently massage for 1~2 min. Then rinse off with warm water and mild soap. 

• Brown glass bottle 15ml, approx 0.5oz
• Please use within 9 months.
• Natural ingredients : organic apricot kernel oil, organic grape seed oil, organic golden jojoba oil, organic extra virgin olive oil, organic sunflower seed oil, olivem 300*, organic Asian Gamcho root, non-gmo vitamin E, organic essential oils^, and love for life. 
^ Bergamot essential oil is Kosher certified and Bergaptene free.
* It is a non-toxin mild co-emulsifier driven from olive oil and has a high degree of biodegradability. It helps wash off the cleansing oil and compared with other plain cleansing oils, it dissolves much better in water. 
• It is good to keep the oil in a cool and shady place, this little care prevents the natural oil from oxidizing.
Please use within 12 months of the day of purchase.

Thank you so much for visiting my shop. 
Have a lovely day.

name: Organic Gamcho Cleansing Oil 60ml
description: · Soothing and nourishing · Mild organic cleansing oil for sensitive skin. · Aroma-therapeutic massage with pure essential oils · Unscented / Lavender / Tea tree / Bergamot * made to order (3~5 days to prepare) * 15% off discount until the end of 2013 Asian licorice 감초(甘草 Gamcho) has been used in traditional Asian medicine for thousands of years. It has both anti-inflammatory and emollient qualities and contains abundant vitamin A, B, C. This herb soothes irritated, inflamed skin and keeps our skin tone bright and healthy. Beside this beautiful herb, I used fresh unrefined organic oils to bring nourishing properties to the cleansing oil. 1. Lavender essential oil, certified organic The main active constituents of lavender oil are linalool, linalyl acetate and beta-caryophyllene, which have analgestic, anti-inflammatory, anti-bacterial effects. Lavender oil is known to sooth irritated skin like minor sunburn, acne, and bug bite. The gentle herbal scent also eases our stressed minds. 2. Tea essential oil, certified organic This oil is noted for its antibacterial and antifungal effects and also has pain-relieving properties. It has been used in treatment of acne, boils and other inflammatory infections. The main active constituents are terpinen-4-ol, gamma-terpinene, and alpha-termpineol. 3. Bergamot essential oil - Bergaptene free, Kosher certified The fresh, fruity scent of bergamot is a key ingredient in classic colognes. It is traditionally used as a mood lifter and as an antiseptic. The main constituents are limonene, lynlal acetate and linalool. They have sedative properties, calming and anxiety-reducing effects and also antibacterial effects. Bergaptene-free bergamot is re-distilled to remove the constituents that can accelerate sunburn. Although it may not remove 100% of make-up, it will be helpful for someone who is looking for a gentle daily cleansing oil. After a long hard day, when you feel dusty and dirty, this cleansing oil will be a little treat for your skin. How to use: Please apply this cleansing oil on your dry skin and gently massage for 1~2 min. Then rinse off with warm water and mild soap. (It is not good to massage for too long, because the dirt and left over make up can be absorbed by your skin. Oh, no!) • Brown glass bottle 60ml • Unscented / Light touch of a herbal scent • Natural ingredients : organic apricot kernel oil, organic golden jojoba oil, organic macadamia nut oil, organic extra virgin olive oil, organic sunflower seed oil, organic non-gmo soy bean oil, olivem 300*, organic Asian Gamcho root, non-gmo vitamin E, organic essential oils^ and love for life. ^ Bergamot essential oil is Kosher certified and Bergaptene free. * It is a non-toxin mild co-emulsifier driven from olive oil and has a high degree of biodegradability. It helps wash off the cleansing oil and compared with other plain cleansing oils, it dissolves much better in water. • It is good to keep the oil in a cool and shady place, this little care prevents the natural oil from oxidizing. Please use within 12 months. Thank you so much for visiting my shop. Have a lovely day. Current Stock : 1

name: Bamboo Charcoal Soap
description: · detox and deep cleansing · natural, vegan friendly · lightly scented with pure essential oils The key ingredient is activated Korean Bamboo Charcoal. Compared with other wood charcoal, it has about 3 times more mineral constituent and 4 times better absorption rate. So it can makes the soap more absorbent and clean deep inside the skin pores. And it leaves no residue on the skin and so allows the pores to breathe and be naturally moisturized. • approx. 4oz • good for sensitive, acne-prone skin • light refreshing scent from pure essential oils such as Citronella, Pine, Tea tree, Eucalyptus, Rosemary, Lavender and Peppermint. • Ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, organic shea butter, sesame seed oil, soy bean oil, canola oil, coconut oil, palm oil, castor oil, activated Korean bamboo charcoal, pure essential oils, purified water, sodium hydroxide, and Love for life. name: Korean Hwangto Clay Soap
description:
· Nourishing and detoxifying
· Rich in minerals, unique clay soap
· All natural, Cold process soap 

Korean HwangTo( 韓國黃土 ) Clay which is called "Loess" has been loved for centuries in Korea. Because it has a long history in curing illness. Even folk remedies using Hwangto are still practiced today. According to the experts, Loess has unique benefits such as providing various minerals and promoting blood circulation and rejuvenates your skin by penetrating deep within and supplying much needed nourishment to your fatigued cells. Plus, the enzymes of Loess can neutralize freeradicals. As it has a large surface area and the same inner structure as sponges, this unique structure with super adsorption can remove dirts and odors completely.

To help keep the skin moist, I formulated the soap recipe with high quality, two main oils such as unrefined hemp seed oil and olive oil. Hemp seed oil is made up of 80% essential fatty acid, the highest amount of any other plant. It contains the ideal ratio of Omega 6 to Omega 3 based on our cells needs and prevents moisture loss. Olive oil has been loved for centuries for skin care. Since the oil has a rich antioxidant and essential fatty acid content, it provides many benefits for the skin, ranging from moisturizing to wound healing. 

• approx. 4oz.
• Good for all skin type
• Gently scented with therapeutic grade essential oils - refreshing forest aroma
• Ingredient:
Korean Hwangto clay, unrefined hemp seed oil, olive oil, sunflower seed oil, canola oil, soy bean oil, castor oil, palm oil, coconut oil, pure essential oils of lavender, pine, tea tree, and eucalyptus, sodium hydroxide, purified water, Love for life.

name: Elvan Clay Soap
description:
· Purifying and balancing
· Made with unique Elvan clay
· Traditional cold process soap with pure essential oils

 Elavan is called 맥반석 Maek-Ban-Suk in Korean. The special clay is made by grinding high quality elvan stone very finely. It is well-known for removing toxins and controlling a ph level. The soap made with Elvan clay helps calm and purify your irritated skin.

Besides this unique ingredient, considering different fatty acids, I added high quality oils such as shea butter, olive oil, apricot kernel oil, and sunflower seed oil. I hope you benefit from them.

• approx. 4oz.
• Gently scented with therapeutic grade essential oils - sweet herbal aroma

Korean elvan clay, shea butter, olive oil, apricot kernel oil,  sunflower seed oil, soy bean oil, castor oil, palm oil, coconut oil, pure essential oils of lavender, tea tree, eucalyptus, ylang ylang, sweet orange,  sodium hydroxide, purified water, and Love for life.

name: Pine Soap
description: · purifying and mild cleansing · natural soap for sensitive combination & oily skin · lightly scented with pure essential oils In China, according to ancient legends, gods chose pine leaves and cones as their main source of food. So it was called "the food of the gods" and "the secret to longevity". In Korea, people also believe that pine leaf has the ability to purify the body and soul. Pine leaves contain chlorophyll, catechins, multi-vitamins (A, C, K), proteins, minerals (iron and phosphorous), fibers, pine oil, and more other nutrients. Above all, catechins are widely known for their powerful antioxidants and anti-aging compounds. And Chlorophyll in the pine leaves stimulates metabolism and blood circulation, which regenerates new cells in our body and improves our skin tone. I used therapeutic grade, wild crafted Korean pine leaves and organic Korean pine leaf powder to make this soap. First, I brewed pine leaf tea to replace plain base water and then made this soap with honey and fresh oils. • approx. 4oz / 3.7oz • good for sensitive combination and oily skin • light pine forest scent from pure essential oils • Ingredients: organic Korean pine leaf powder, wild crafted & therapeutic grade Korean pine leaves, honey, extra virgin olive oil, avocado oil, macadamia nut oil, soy bean oil, canola oil, coconut oil, palm oil, castor oil, pure essential oils of pine, winter green, eucalyptus, and rosemary, purified water, sodium hydroxide, and love for life. * Custom Order If you want to purchase multiple items, please send me a message. I will set up a custom listing with appropriate shipping charges for you. Thank you so much for visiting my shop.

name: Olive & Shea Butter Soap
description:
· nourishing and mild cleansing
· extra virgin olive oil marseille soap with lots of shea butter
· unscented cold process soap that provides a soft, creamy lather

This is a very basic and mild soap created with a unique formula. 
The main oils are extra virgin olive oil and shea butter. 
Olive oil is a natural source of many of the essential vitamins and moisture which our skin needs. It contains caffeic acid, oleic acid, polyphenols and oleuropein — all of which are potent antioxidants. Extra virgin olive oil, which is considered the best, least processed oil, is an especially excellent natural moisturizer for the skin.
And shea Butter nourishes the skin with Vitamins A, E and F. Vitamins A and E keep the skin clear and healthy. They are particularly helpful for sun damaged skin.

• approx. 4oz / 3.5oz
• good for sensitive skin
• Ingredients:
extra virgin olive oil, shea butter, coconut oil, palm oil, purified water, sodium hydroxide, and Love for life.

name: Red Wine Pink Clay Soap
description:
· Nourishing and Mild cleansing
· Unscented, natural cold process soap, vegan friendly
· Lovely facial soap for sensitive skin

The key ingredients of this soap are red wine, French pink clay.
Red wine is such a good source of powerful antioxidants like polyphenol, resveratrol and proanthocyanidins which remove harmful free oxygen radicals from cells and have anti-aging and anti-inflammatory effects.
French Pink Clay is considered one of mildest clays and works well for sensitive, reactive skin types. Due to the high content of micro-nutrients, it provides the minerals and oligo elements needed for a healthy, glowing complexion. It also detoxifies the skin, removes dead skin cells and creates refreshed skin tone.

Beside the two beautiful ingredients I used high quality base oils such as extra virgin olive oil, organic rosehip oil, shea butter, and avocado oil. To make gentle soap bars, I carefully controlled the temperature at all times and conducted a special curing step for 48 hours during the making process. 

·  approx. 4oz / 3.7oz
·  Unscented 
·  Ingredients : red wine, French pink clay, extra virgin olive oil, organic rosehip oil, shea butter, avocado oil, soy bean oil, canola oil, castor oil, palm oil, coconut oil, sodium hydroxide, purified water and love for life.

name: Red Wine Body Soap
description:
· soothing & nourishing
· unscented, red wine soap for sensitive skin
· lovely soft texture for mild body wash

The key ingredients of this soap are red wine, French pink clay, olive oil and organic rosehip oil. 
Red wine is such a good source of powerful antioxidants like polyphenol, resveratrol and proanthocyanidins which remove harmful free oxygen radicals from cells and have anti-aging and anti-inflammatory effects. 
French Pink Clay is considered one of the mildest clays and works well for sensitive, reactive skin types. It provides abundant minerals, detoxifies the skin, and removes dead skin cells.

• Unscented
• Weight 5.5oz
Once the soap is cured for long, the quality gets better but it weighs less.
• Ingredients : red wine, French pink clay, avocado oil, pure olive oil, organic rosehip oil, canola oil, soy bean oil, castor oil, palm oil, coconut oil, sodium hydroxide, and love for life.
